item.title: It's not you. It's the docs.
item.description: “It says speechSynthesis.speak returns ‘void.’ What’s ‘void?’” “It says that? Well…” I tried to think of an answer that was both honest and helpful. I settled on, “some people use the word ‘void’ to mean the absence of a value. For JavaScript code, they really mean undefined.” Cat, ever focused on the task at hand, took my hand-waving for what it was and continued working on her web application. But that interaction stuck with me.

item.title: Resolving confusion over how to return from a C++ coroutine - The Old New Thing
item.description: A customer was having trouble writing a coroutine using C++/WinRT.
